dmca.title: [TP-C571442Q] Copyright Infringement for
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Wednesday, August 23, 2006 2:15 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [TP-C571442Q] Copyright Infringement for Subject: [TP-C571442Q] Copyright Infringement for From: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [TP-C571442Q] Copyright Infringement for Reference: [TP-C571442Q] For your review. Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ ==== Original Message ==== 1. Copyright Infringement for Added by system at Tuesday, Aug 22 2006 09:33 pm X-MailFrom: joao@braviawebdesign.com X-RcptTo: abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com Received: from [172.16.214.181] by [10.5.0.64] (abacus) for ; Tue Aug 22 21:27:12 2006 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 22 Aug 2006 21:27:12 -0500 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.111]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from joao@braviawebdesign.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GFiSW-0004xL-Or for abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com; Tue, 22 Aug 2006 21:27:12 -0500 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 22 Aug 2006 21:27:11 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from joao@braviawebdesign.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GFiSV-0006Or-1g for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 22 Aug 2006 21:27:11 -0500 Received: from mail2.thesupernet.com ([66.81.88.44]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from joao@braviawebdesign.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GFiST-0004w5-Jx for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 22 Aug 2006 21:27:09 -0500 Received: from adsl-63-197-185-189.dsl.lsan03.pacbell.net [63.197.185.189] by mail2.thesupernet.com with SMTP; Tue, 22 Aug 2006 19:26:32 -0700 Message-Id: <6.2.3.4.0.20060822191621.03b08b20@mail2.thesupernet.com> X-Mailer: QUALCOMM Windows Eudora Version 6.2.3.4 Date: Tue, 22 Aug 2006 19:26:25 -0700 To: diegoenriques@hotmail.com From: =?iso-8859-1?Q?=22Jo=E3o_P=2E_Bragan=E7a=22?= Subject: Copyright Infringement for Cc: abuse@theplanet.com,abuse@websitewelcome.com Mime-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="=====================_1212960656==.ALT" Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 66.81.88.44 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of braviawebdesign.com) client-ip=66.81.88.44; envelope-from=joao@braviawebdesign.com; helo=mail2.thesupernet.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 23 Aug 2006 02:27:11.0478 (UTC) FILETIME=[A38B5960:01C6C65B] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Dear Mr. Garcia, It has come to our attention that a website you designed for one of your clients, sewingmachinejf.com, is in fact using a substantial amount of intellectual property belonging to Bravia Web Design. Please see http://www.cutsewservice.com/RIDE for an example. I need not remind of the severe federal penalty for these types of violations. Please consider this notice as a CEASE AND DESIST order. I will refer you to your top level host's (theplanet.com) policy for these types of violations. Intellectual Property Infringement Policy Customers may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host, or otherwise store on a Server any information, data, material, or work that infringes the intellectual property rights of others. The Planet has the right to disable access to, or remove, infringing content to the extent required under any law or regulation, including the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998. The Planet reserves the right to suspend permanently or terminate the Services of any Customer that repeatedly violates The Planet's Intellectual Property Infringement Policy or any copyright law. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me at 310.327.9166. joão p. bragança Bravia Web Design 310.327.9166 http://braviawebdesign.com/ MIME element (text/html) Dear Mr. Garcia,

It has come to our attention that a website you designed for one of your clients, sewingmachinejf.com, is in fact using a substantial amount of intellectual property belonging to Bravia Web Design. Please see http://www.cutsewservice.com/RIDE for an example. I need not remind of the severe federal penalty for these types of violations. Please consider this notice as a CEASE AND DESIST order. I will refer you to your top level host's (theplanet.com) policy for these types of violations.


Intellectual Property Infringement Policy

Customers may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host, or otherwise store on a Server any information, data, material, or work that infringes the intellectual property rights of others. The Planet has the right to disable access to, or remove, infringing content to the extent required under any law or regulation, including the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998.

The Planet reserves the right to suspend permanently or terminate the Services of any Customer that repeatedly violates The Planet's Intellectual Property Infringement Policy or any copyright law.

If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me at 310.327.9166.

joão p. bragança
Bravia Web Design
